title: Stepping Up In A Time Of Crisis
description: In this episode of Mobilize, producer Betsy Nagler speaks with State Senator Alessandra Biaggi and Assemblymember Catalina Cruz, two truly progressive leaders in New York who won their races against much more conservative opponents, to learn how the COVID-19 crisis has affected their districts, what they have been doing to help, and the implications for the political landscape moving forward.
